CmdLine: yum clean metadata && 	yum -y upgrade && 	yum -y install epel-release && 	yum clean metadata && 	yum -y install make which tar rpm-build yum-utils python-argparse python-yaml java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel gcc gcc-c++ createrepo jq glibc-static && 	yum clean all
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir -p /download && 	curl -o /download/apache-maven-${MAVEN_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz http://apache.cs.utah.edu/maven/maven-3/${MAVEN_VERSION}/binaries/apache-maven-${MAVEN_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz && 	mkdir -p /opt && 	cd /opt && 	tar -zxf /download/apache-maven-${MAVEN_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz && 	ln -sf "${MAVEN_HOME}/bin/mvn" /usr/bin/mvn
Commands.Name: run
